text: Bernard Labourdette (13 August 1946 – 20 July 2022) was a French professional road bicycle racer. He won stage 16A in the 1971 Tour de France. Labourdette was born in Lurbe-Saint-Christau, France. Labourdette died on 20 July 2022 at the age of 75.Bernard Labourdette, vainqueur d'étape sur le Tour de France 1971, est mort ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Pyrénées-Atlantiques Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle-Aquitaine
title: Bernard Labourdette
